description: The official development environment for writing, testing, and deploying smart contracts on TON. Similar to Hardhat but for the TVM
A new, high-level programming language for TON smart contracts that is strongly typed and designed to be familiar to TypeScript/Rust developers
The lower-level, C-like programming language used to write raw smart contracts for the TON Virtual Machine (TVM)
The standard protocol and SDK for connecting TON wallets to decentralized applications (dApps), replacing standard WalletConnect in the TON ecosystem
The primary HTTP API gateway for interacting with the TON blockchain, offering a reliable entry point for sending messages and querying state
A tool that allows developers to run a local instance of the TON blockchain for rapid smart contract testing and debugging
The official IntelliJ/IDEA plugin providing syntax highlighting, code completion, and tool integration for FunC and Tact development
A decentralized infrastructure layer that provides reliable, unrestricted RPC access to the TON network via a network of guardian nodes
A command-line interface for compiling, testing, and deploying FunC smart contracts on the TON blockchain, commonly used in low-level TON development workflows
A low-level stack-based programming language for the TON Virtual Machine (TVM), primarily used for tooling, scripts, and advanced contract development
The official lightweight client for interacting directly with the TON blockchain, forming the underlying protocol used by most TON RPC and API providers
An official SDK for integrating Tonkeeper wallet functionality into applications, enabling transaction signing, payments, and account interactions on TON
Official UI components and helpers built on top of TON Connect that simplify wallet connection flows and transaction approval UX for TON dApps
The official Telegram Mini Apps SDK enabling developers to build in-app experiences with native TON wallet connectivity and blockchain-based payments
An NFT-focused API and indexing service for the TON ecosystem, providing access to collections, items, metadata, and marketplace data
An analytics and explorer API offering programmatic access to TON blockchain data including transactions, accounts, validators, and network statistics
